title: Neon Mirage Capsule
description: Holographic gradients collide with vaporwave silhouettes to form a lucid AI mirage.

title: Lumen Drift Capsule
description: Soft ribbons of light weave through abstract frames with a cosmic hush.

title: Velvet Lattice Capsule
description: Matte indigo panels reveal glitch-threaded geometry suspended in calm shadow.

title: Holographic Echo Capsule
description: Echoing arcs of chrome shimmer like retro-futurist sound waves.

title: Solar Bloom Capsule
description: Petaled sunbursts unfold like cosmic flora rendered through neural dye.

title: Prism Noir Capsule
description: Charcoal gradients fracture light into prismatic flare lines.

title: Stardust Glyph Capsule
description: Glyphic marks float across iridescent dust fields with cosmic pacing.

title: Coral Glitch Capsule
description: Digital coral reefs pixelate into glitch harmonies and pastel noise.

title: Midnight Reverberation Capsule
description: Magnetic waves pulse through obsidian gradients like retro synth echoes.

title: Plasma Loom Capsule
description: Threads of plasma weave neon cloths that shimmer with glitch seams.

title: Nova Montage Capsule

title: Vapor Bloom Capsule
description: Suspended mist forms volumetric petals with AI-sculpted lighting.
